text:
Pictured: Base dual cabinet Recombiner configuration
4000A, 1500VDC RECOMBINER
FEATURES
• Versatile Design: 4000A, 1500VDC Recombiner Cabinet optimized for standalone Battery Energy 2
Storage and Solar + Storage applications.
• Designed for Compliance: Designed in accordance with UL 1741 and CSA standards but not
certified.
• Customizable Protection: Tailored input fuse options to accommodate unique application
requirements.
• Enhanced Safety: Optional input-side disconnects provide superior isolation capabilities.
• Integrated Control Options: Optional input-side contactor controls for seamless operational
flexibility.
TECHNICAL INFORMATION

2. Approximate outer dimensions represent the two-cabinet design for the Fuse-only OR Fuse + Input-Side Contactor configurations.
Envelope dimensions for the base 4000A dual cabinet with additional MLBD cabinet are: H x D x W= 1234mm x 456mm x 7890 (123” x 456” x 789”)

text:
AI caption: **Type of image:** Photo
**Main components:** Electrical enclosure with two doors, handles, and a danger sign.
**Technical details:** "shoals" logo, "DANGER" sign.

PART NUMBER CONFIGURATION
STG . BSR . 08 . C40 01 N . ZZ R 1 . DF N C
Input Fuse Configuration
(Pairs of fuses on both (+) and (-) terminals)
01 = 1 pairs (2 fuses total)
02 = 2 pairs (4 fuses total)
03 = 3 pairs (6 fuses total)
16 = 16 pairs (32 fuses total)
Cabinet Rating
C40 = 4000A, 1500VDC
Input Fuse Rating & Design
Consult factory -Available options 80A-630A
Input-Side Disconnects1
N = None
S = Yes (Special Order Only)
Main Output Fuse Rating & Design
Consult factory - Available options 125A-4000A
ZZ = No Main Output Fuse
Number of Cabinets
Note: Number of input fuses and options will determine number of cabinets. See Key Notes.
2 = Dual Cabinet (not available with Input-Side Disconnects option.)
3 = Triple Cabinet (required for Input-Side Disconnect option; available for all other configurations.)
Surge Protector Option
N = No Surge Protector Option (consult factory if Surge Protector Option is needed)
Input-Side Contactor Option2
Blank = No Input-Side Contactor Option
C = Battery Contactor Option (Special Order Only)
Key Notes:
Configurations with no Input-Side Disconnect or Input-Side Contactor are limited to 8 fuse pairs per cabinet. Configurations exceeding 8 fuse
pairs will need additional cabinets.
• 1-8 fuse pairs = 2 cabinet
• 9-16 fuse pairs = 3 cabinets
1) Input-Side Disconnect Option:
• Requires 3 cabinets
• Input-Side Disconnects are in a separate cabinet from the fuse pairs
• Limited to a maximum of 8 fuse pairs
• Available with 6 or 8 disconnects only
• Not available if Input-Side Contactor option is selected
2) Input-Side Contactor Option:
• Limited to 6 fuse pairs per cabinet. Configurations exceeding 6 fuse pairs will need additional cabinets
• 1-6 fuse pairs = 2 cabinet
• 7-12 fuse pairs = 3 cabinets
• Not available if Input-Side Disconnect option is selected

DIMENSIONS, DUAL CABINET
External dimensions for units with (1) Fuses-Only or (2) Fuses and Input-Side Contactor option.
